EmailTemplate.subject: Setting Up Your Solar Power Consultation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Are you ready to start saving on electricity by going solar? We are here to help you take the next step and get set up with a solar energy consultant who can help find the SunPower© solar system that’s right for you!
It’s a free, no-obligation appointment in your home with a knowledgeable solar professional. During this time, you’ll be able to ask all of your questions, discuss your needs, and review your options.
To set up the appointment, please give us a call or reply to this email with a couple of times that would work best for you. We will ask a couple questions about your home, schedule the appointment and send a confirmation to summarize the details.
Thanks again for your interest in SunPower©! We look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Sincerely,
Your Solar Advisor Team
1-844-877-8676 (1-844-US-SUNPOWER)
solaradvisors@sunpower.com
P.S. If you are no longer interested in solar power, please call us or let us know via email.
